short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mandarin learning tool for English speakers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bamboo is a tool to help you learn Mandarin. Enter any character you would like to study or be reminded of using the popup, you can even autofill the pinyin and definition. Now whenever you open a new tab, a character will be shown to you for you to study. Hover over it to reveal its meaning and pinyin. If you get it right, increase your confidence, we won't show characters that you're 100% confident in.
